title: Statement by the Press Secretary regarding H.R. 1626 and S.J.Res. 8 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 08, 2009

 



Statement by the Press Secretary regarding H.R. 1626 and S.J.Res. 8




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  _______________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                        May 8, 2009  STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY   On Thursday, May 7, 2009, the President signed into law:   H.R. 1626, the "Statutory Time-Periods Technical Amendments Act of 2009," which makes technical amendments to laws containing time periods affecting judicial proceedings; and   S.J.Res. 8, which provides for the appointment of David M. Rubenstein as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
